name: One Bird
description:
Move with WASD and shoot birds  with the right click button

Try to reach the glowing ball as fast as possible

Thanks and enjoy playing.

(Assets used)

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/simplistic-low-poly-nature...
